jsonFlow.files.includedFilePatterns.description: Glob patterns to include in the package.

jsonFlow.files.excludedFilePatterns.description: Glob patterns to exclude from the package. The default is node_modules, dist, out, build, and any hidden files.

jsonFlow.files.includeFilePath.description: Show the path of the file in the name of the list of generated files

jsonFlow.graph.layoutOrientation.description: The direction of the layout of the graph. TB is top to bottom, LR is left to right.
